message.body: Sorry we ran out so quickly. Cory wanted to squeeze something in before dinner and I was flustered about my phone
How is everything?
With you and with Kyle? :)
No worries!! Everything is fine. He's crying a bit :/ I changed diaper, tried feeding, read to him etc
So I just put him down now to see if maybe he would just fall asleep
I'll give him some time and if he doesn't I'll try feeding again
Tried playing on play mat too
Each thing distracted him for a bit but not that long so I am just seeing if maybe he's tired
Cory says that he usually carries Kyle around walking and that Kyle calms down
Cory said Kyle likes walking outside
Cool!
Yeah I did that and it worked
Ah ok
I will take him outside in a bit then thanks he's ok now
My strategy is feeding him thai I share Cory's strategies
Hahaha k
He likes sitting on the stoop haha
I woke him at 545 so I doubt he would sleep before 746 and if he were to sleep and wake up that's when I'd feed him
K haha stoop is great idea
Thnx
Hmm I think you might have a plumbing issue as I just used your downstairs bathroom and it somehow caused flooding around your washer??

Is there anything I should do to deal w it? It seems to have just overflowed from your laundry room or something. It isn't continuously flooding or anything but aside from mopping it up, anything I should do?
Ok we will get the bill here and come home now. Don't worry about doing anything. How is Kyle
Kyle is great
Hmm don't let it cut your dinner short, it's not going to become a worse problem in an hr or anything
We are done anyway
Ah ok
Paying bill now
Take your time! It's not really an emergency just unfortunate for you I suppose- hopefully it is a simple fix. I would have just plunged your toilet and mopped up but couldn't find plunger ?
Leaking seems to be coming from washer area I dunno
We are stopping at a bank so we can pay you :)
Oh yay! I like money lol
Ingrid +
Ha
Lol
I feel bad about your plumbing tho . I swear I didn't do anything strange or flush a tampon or anything equally stupid
This is not my night. First my phone breaks then my plumbing. :(
Yes exactly
We had a flood before. Just once we thought it was rain. This is second time but not sure if it's same issue
